   20: 
   21: -module(t11_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -compile(export_all).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %% @spec suite() -> Info
   29: %% Info = [tuple()]
   30: %% @end
   31: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{require,file},
   34:      {require,tcname},
   35:      {timetrap,{seconds,1}}].
   36: 
   37: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   38: %% @spec init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   39: %%     Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   40: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   41: %% Reason = term()
   42: %% @end
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   45: 
   46:     TCName = ct:get_config(tcname),
   47:     CfgFiles = ct:get_config(file,undefined,[all]),
   48: 
   49:     %% verify that expected config file can be read
   50:     case {TCName,CfgFiles} of
   51: 	{start_separate,[cfg11]} -> ok;
   52: 	{start_join,[cfg11,cfg21]} -> ok;
   53: 	{incl_separate1,[cfg11]} -> ok;
   54: 	{incl_separate2,[cfg11]} -> ok;
   55: 	{incl_join1,[cfg21,cfg11]} -> ok;
   56: 	{incl_join1,[cfg12,cfg11,cfg21]} -> ok;
   57: 	{incl_join2,[cfg21,cfg11,cfg12]} -> ok;
   58: 	{incl_both1,[cfg11]} -> ok;
   59: 	{incl_both2,[cfg11,cfg12,cfg21]} -> ok;
   60: 	{incl_both2,[cfg11]} -> ok;
   61: 	_ -> ok
   62: 
   63:     end,
   64: 
   65:     %% test the get_testspec_terms functionality
   66:     if CfgFiles /= undefined ->
   67: 	    TSTerms = case ct:get_testspec_terms() of
   68: 			  undefined -> exit('testspec should not be undefined');
   69: 			  Result -> Result
   70: 		      end,
   71: 	    true = lists:keymember(config, 1, TSTerms),
   72: 	    {config,TSCfgFiles} = ct:get_testspec_terms(config),
   73: 	    [{config,TSCfgFiles},{tests,Tests}] = 
   74: 		ct:get_testspec_terms([config,tests]),
   75: 	    CfgNames = [list_to_atom(filename:basename(TSCfgFile)) ||
   76: 			   {Node,TSCfgFile} <- TSCfgFiles, Node == node()],
   77: 	    true = (length(CfgNames) == length(CfgFiles)),
   78: 	    [true = lists:member(CfgName,CfgFiles) || CfgName <- CfgNames],
   79: 	    true = lists:any(fun({{_Node,_Dir},Suites}) ->
   80: 				     lists:keymember(?MODULE, 1, Suites)
   81: 			     end, Tests);
   82:        true ->
   83: 	    ok
   84:     end,
   85: 
   86:     Config.
   87: 
   88: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   89: %% @spec end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   90: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   91: %% @end
   92: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   93: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   94:     ok.
   95: 
   96: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   97: %% @spec init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   98: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   99: %% GroupName = atom()
  100: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  101: %% Reason = term()
  102: %% @end
  103: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  104: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  105:     Config.
  106: 
  107: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  108: %% @spec end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
  109: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
  110: %% GroupName = atom()
  111: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  112: %% @end
  113: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  114: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
  115:     ok.
  116: 
  117: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  118: %% @spec init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
  119: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
  120: %% TestCase = atom()
  121: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  122: %% Reason = term()
  123: %% @end
  124: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  125: init_per_testcase(autoskip_tc, Config) ->
  126:     exit(kaboom),
  127:     Config;
  128: 
  129: init_per_testcase(userskip_tc, Config) ->
  130:     {skip,"user skipped"};
  131: 
  132: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  133:     Config.
  134: 
  135: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  136: %% @spec end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
  137: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1} | {fail,Reason}
  138: %% TestCase = atom()
  139: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  140: %% Reason = term()
  141: %% @end
  142: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  143: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  144:     ok.
  145: 
  146: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  147: %% @spec groups() -> [Group]
  148: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
  149: %% GroupName = atom()
  150: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
  151: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  152: %% TestCase = atom()
  153: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
  154: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  155: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  156: %% N = integer() | forever
  157: %% @end
  158: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  159: groups() ->
  160:     [].
  161: 
  162: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  163: %% @spec all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  164: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  165: %% GroupName = atom()
  166: %% TestCase = atom()
  167: %% Reason = term()
  168: %% @end
  169: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  170: all() -> 
  171:     [ok_tc, exit_tc, to_tc, autoskip_tc, userskip_tc].
  172: 
  173: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  174: %% @spec TestCase(Config0) ->
  175: %%               ok | exit() | {skip,Reason} | {comment,Comment} |
  176: %%               {save_config,Config1} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
  177: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  178: %% Reason = term()
  179: %% Comment = term()
  180: %% @end
  181: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  182: ok_tc(_) ->
  183:     ok.
  184: 
  185: exit_tc(_) ->
  186:     exit(kaboom),
  187:     ok.
  188: 
  189: to_tc(_) ->
  190:     ct:timetrap(1),
  191:     ct:sleep(100),
  192:     ok.
  193: 
  194: autoskip_tc(_) ->
  195:     ok.
  196: 
  197: userskip_tc(_) ->
  198:     ok.
  199:     
  200: 
  201: 
  202:
